Effects.Full:
Thermal Recovery: Before being attacked, restores HP equivalent to 30% of the caster's ATK and 2 Stability points, and randomly dispels 1 buff from the attacker. This effect can only activate once, and is considered as a Burn type buff

Overflowing Flame: When gaining this effect and after the end of an action, this unit and all friendly units within a 1 tile radius receives fixed damage equivalent to 10% of the holder's ATK. This is considered as a Burn type debuff

Panic: Unable to be controlled. Automatically moves away from the unit that applied this effect. This effect is removed when the unit that applied this effect dies

Stun: Unable to take action

Taunt: Unable to be controlled. Forced to use normal attack against the unit that applied this effect. Effect is dispelled when the unit that applied this effect dies

Induce: Unable to be controlled. Forced to move towards the unit that applied this effect. Effect is dispelled when the unit that applied this effect dies

Action Support: This is considered as a Support attack. Attacks once. Cannot be triggered by Support attacks

Flame Assault II: Increases ATK by 15%. This is considered as a Burn type buff

Damage Increase II: Increases damage dealt by 20%. This is considered as a buff

Thermal Cycle: When Thermal Recovery is consumed, gains 1 layer of Thermal Recovery. Can be activated once. This is considered as a Burn type buff and cannot be dispelled

Basic.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 7 tile radius and deals Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK to it

Skill.SkillName:
Careful Hospitality

(Skill / Single Target / Heal / Buff)
Skill.Description: Selects an enemy target within a 7 tile radius, and deals Burn damage equivalent to 130% ATK to it. After attacking, restores HP equivalent to 100% ATK to the nearest allied unit (excluding self), and gains Thermal Recovery for self. If the enemy target has Overflowing Flame, heals an additional ally (excluding self)
Skill.Vertebrae 1: If Centaureissi has Thermal Recovery, gains Thermal Cycle

Skill2.SkillName:
Zucchero's Special Drink

(Skill / AoE / Heal / Dispel)
Skill2.Description: Select an ally within a 7 tile radius, and restores HP equivalent to 150% ATK to the ally and all allies within a 3 tiles radius, with the healing amount being evenly distributed among all targets. Additionally, deals AoE Physical Damage equivalent to 50% ATK to all enemies within range. If the enemy target has Overflowing Flame, dispels 2 buffs from the target
Skill2.Vertebrae 3: Restores HP equivalent to 75% ATK to each ally at minimum
Skill2.Fixed Key 4: Zucchero's Special Drink: Restores HP equivalent to 150% → 225% ATK

Ultimate.SkillName:
Afternoon Tea Break

(Ultimate / Heal / Stability Recovery / Dispel / Buff)
Ultimate.Description: Restores HP equivalent to 100% ATK to all allies, cleanses 2 debuffs, dispels Panic and Stun, and restores 7 Stability to the ally with the lowest Stability. After healing, applies Thermal Recovery
Ultimate.Vertebrae 3: Cleanses 2 → 3 debuffs, dispels Panic, Stun, Taunt, and Induce
Ultimate.Vertebrae 5: Restores 7 → 8 Stability to 1 → 2 ally with the lowest Stability

Passive.Description:
At the start of the battle, gains Thermal Recovery

When Centaureissi has Thermal Recovery, increases damage dealt by 20%, additionally restores HP equivalent to 10% max HP when healing and applies Overflowing Flame on active attack for 2 turns

If an ally dealt single target damage to an enemy within attack range, Centaureissi activates Action Support against the enemy first, dealing Physical damage equivalent to 80% ATK and 3 Stability Damage to it, applies Thermal Recovery for the ally, and increases Contamination Gauge by 1 point. This effect can be triggered up to 2 times per turn
Passive.Vertebrae 4: When Action Support is activated, applies Flame Assault II and Damage Increase II on the ally for 1 turn
Passive.Vertebrae 6: When Centaureissi has Thermal Recovery, increases damage dealt by 20% → 40% and increases healing efficacy by 20%. If the healed ally has Thermal Recovery, increases healing efficacy by 50% instead, if the enemy target has Overflowing Flame, increases damage dealt by 50% instead

1.Effect: When Action Support is activated, applies Flame Assault II and Damage Increase II on the ally for 1 turn

2.Effect: When Centaureissi has Thermal Recovery, increases damage dealt by 20% → 40% and increases healing efficacy by 20%. If the healed ally has Thermal Recovery, increases healing efficacy by 50% instead, if the enemy target has Overflowing Flame, increases damage dealt by 50% instead

3.Effect: If Centaureissi has Thermal Recovery, gains Thermal Cycle

4.Effect: Cleanses 2 → 3 debuffs, dispels Panic, Stun, Taunt, and Induce

5.Effect: Restores HP equivalent to 75% ATK to each ally at minimum

6.Effect: Restores 7 → 8 Stability to 1 → 2 ally with the lowest Stability

2.Effect: At the start of the battle, increases Contamination Gauge by 3 points

3.Effect: If an ally within a 7 tile radius enters into Stability Break after being attacked, consumes Thermal Recovery from self and applies Thermal Recovery on the ally

4.Effect: When Thermal Recovery is triggered, dispels 1 random buff from the attacker. Before triggering Thermal Recovery, cleanses 2 debuffs from self

5.Effect: Zucchero's Special Drink: Restores HP equivalent to 150% → 225% ATK

6.Effect: When healing allies, cleanses 1 debuff from the target. Cleanses an additional debuff from healing targets with Thermal Recovery

7.Effect: When healing allies, if the target has Thermal Recovery, applies a random powerful buff for 1 turn

8.Effect: HP +5.0% / At the end of the action, applies Thermal Recovery to the nearest ally without Thermal Recovery. This has a cooldown of 2 turns
